titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: PERSON GENOTYPIC SEX FOR NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET - Description

div.p: The genotypic (chromosomal) sex of a PERSON, recorded for the purposes of the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care and the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment.
If the genotypic sex cannot be determined at birth, National Code 'Indeterminate/Intersex' should be used.
Once the chromosomal sex of the baby has been determined, the PERSON GENOTYPIC SEX (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) should be resubmitted with the correct value.
